content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) that smelts iron ore into iron plates.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) that smelts copper ore into copper plates.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) performing automation research (input: {automation-science-pack: 10}, status: NO_POWER).
- ElectricityGroup connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5), and (8.5, 6.5).

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(-10.5, 18.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position(-10.5, 18.5) with warnings ["not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections"] and connection points at positions (-10.5, 16.0) and (-10.5, 21.0).
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) with status NO_FUEL, warning "out of fuel", containing approximately 186.8 units of water at temperature 15; it has connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5) delivering steam at (-7.5, 24.5).
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) with status WORKING.
- Manual Fuel Feeding System represented by a wooden chest at position(-4.5, 25.5).
- Pipeline Network consisting of:
  - PipeGroup at position(-5.5, 19.5) with fluid_system = 68670 and status WORKING.
  - PipeGroup at position(-2.5, 19.5) with fluid_system = 68669 and status EMPTY.
  - PipeGroup at position(5.5, 21.5) with fluid_system = 68682 and status EMPTY.
  - PipeGroup at position(1.5, 23.5) with fluid_system = 68681 and status EMPTY.
  - PipeGroup at position(-7.5, 25.5) with fluid_system = 68677 and status EMPTY.
  - PipeGroup at position(0.5, 24.5) with fluid_system = 68686 and status EMPTY.
  - PipeGroup at position(1.5, 25.5) with fluid_system = 68685 and status EMPTY.
  - PipeGroup at position(1.5, 27.5) with fluid_system = 68688 and status EMPTY.
  - PipeGroup at position(4.5, 27.5) with fluid_system = 68689 and status EMPTY.
  - PipeGroup at position(-0.5, 28.5) with fluid_system = 68690 and status EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Pipeline Connection & Fluid Transfer:
  - Ensure both source and target connection points are unobstructed, within the effective range, and share matching fluid system assignments.

• Entity Placement & Collision Avoidance:
  - Confirm that target tiles are unoccupied before attempting to place any entity.

• Buildable Area Calculation:
  - Use precise placement attributes during position determination to avoid type-related errors.

• Pipe Group Identification & Fluid System Mapping:
  - Verify that candidate pipe groups possess the correct fluid system identifiers and are situated within the required search radius.

• Steam Engine Repositioning Failures:
  - Repeated repositioning attempts using candidate pipe groups with various fluid_system IDs have failed. Previous attempts involved fluid_system IDs [66014, 66098, 66180, 66264, 66346, 66430, 66512, 66596, 66678, 66762, 66844, 66928, 67010, 67094, 67176, 67260] and [67342, 67426, 67508, 67592, 67674, 67758, 67840, 67924]. New attempts with candidate pipe groups having fluid_system IDs [68006, 68090, 68172, 68256, 68338, 68422, 68504] within a 10- to 15-tile radius of Position(x=-5.5, y=19.5) also returned no candidates. Consider expanding the search radius or revising the fluid system configuration on pipeline entities.

• Boiler Fuel Supply Management:
  - Monitor fuel levels diligently and replenish boiler fuel promptly to prevent operational shutdown.

• General Connection Strategies:
  - Assess environmental constraints and verify inventory levels before executing repositioning or pipeline attachment actions.
